snippet.title: Game Development | #Return: Unknown - Teaser | Free-to-play
snippet.description:
Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/app/2760710/discussions/
····················································································
Allgemein:
➠ Sollte euch was nicht gefallen haben, lasst mir Kommentare da, was man verbessern könnte.

➠ Für ein Abo oder ein Like würde ich mich trotzdem sehr freuen.
····················································································
Game: #Return: Unknown
➠ Art: Survival Extraction Shooter ( #OpenWorldSurvival )
➠ Sprache: More
➠ Alpha

Planned
➠ Singleplayer and Multiplayer (pvp and pve)
➠ Local Server 
➠ Dedicat. Server 

GENRE: Action, Abenteuer, Indie, Early Access

Welcome to the post-apocalyptic world of Return: Unknown, the unique free-to-play survival extraction shooter. This immersive adventure is crafted with utmost dedication, based on high-quality assets sourced from an impressive array of developers, modelers, music producers and graphic designers - a veritable symphony of creativity.

The birth of Return: Unknown stems from a deep desire for a game that was not just wanted but passionately anticipated, criticized, and even hated. We understand that many players have experienced disappointments when their expectations were not met. Our goal is to bridge this gap and provide a gaming experience that aligns with the visions of our community.

Return: Unknown is not just a game; it's a movement – created to revive the potential of another game. We invite you not only as a spectator but as an active part of our passionate community to shape and mold this project.

Our shop page opens the gateway to this exciting world. Experience how the players' visions and the skills of many asset developers merge into a harmonious overall experience. Be prepared to face the unknown – be ready for Return: Unknown, your gateway to a free and unforgettable survival-extraction adventure.

It's a challenge that demands a lot and comes with highs and lows. Together, we are strong enough to achieve greatness – even if we fail, we have all pulled together.
····················································································
